title: EUROBIKE Announces Move to Frankfurt, earlier show dates & Fresh Concepts
content:
For years now, EUROBIKE has called the small German town of Friedrichshafen home. That all changes for 2022. Next year, the annual cycling showcase known as EUROBIKE will move from its long standing home outside of Lake Constance, to Frankfurt, Germany. Stamped across the event giant’s website is the statement, “We are changing the concept […]

The post EUROBIKE Announces Move to Frankfurt, earlier show dates & Fresh Concepts appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jilli Cluff
